title: Your name
text:
Welcome to the lukmayer.github.io website template!
The way this template is intended is that you look at the source files and the rendered site at the same time to see how the different features I show you throughout this template can be used. This is because I provide a lot of comments in the source files to help you. These comments do not necessarily show in the rendered site. Hope you enjoy!

Some tips about revealjs

freeze: true can cause issues

delete that folder and re-render the presentation.

Some tips about revealjs 2

you may have to render the presentation separately, before rendering the website.
so edit your presentation with the revealjs freeze folder removed
then render the presentation file, and then render the website.
